n_bins = 50
a1 = ot.datasets.make_1D_gauss(n_bins, m=20, s=10)
a2 = ot.datasets.make_1D_gauss(n_bins, m=40, s=10)
a = ot.datasets.make_1D_gauss(n_bins, m=30, s=10)
D = np.vstack((a1, a2)).T
M = ot.utils.dist0(n_bins)
M /= M.max()
M0 = ot.utils.dist0(2)
M0 /= M0.max()
h0 = ot.unif(2)
reg = 0.001
um = ot.bregman.unmix(a, D, M, M0, h0, reg, 1, alpha=0.01)
np.testing.assert_allclose(1, np.sum(um), rtol=0.001, atol=0.001)
np.testing.assert_allclose([0.5, 0.5], um, rtol=0.001, atol=0.001)
ot.bregman.unmix(a, D, M, M0, h0, reg, 1, alpha=0.01, log=True, verbose=True)
